items.title: Shipping
items.desc: ArcNxt handles shipping and delivery so you can focus on selling. Only applicable GST is charged on shipping, and sellers have complete control over product pricing.

items.title: Returns Management
items.desc: The seller dashboard gives complete visibility into returns, enabling real-time improvements and helping reduce return-related costs.

items.title: Cancellations
items.desc: There are zero penalties for genuine seller or system cancellations, allowing you to operate without unnecessary stress.

items.title: Return to Origin (RTO)
items.desc: If delivery attempts are unsuccessful, the shipment is returned without any additional return shipping charges.

charges.title: ArcNxt Shipping & Delivery Charges
paragraphs: ArcNxt provides cost-effective shipping across India through trusted logistics partners who pick up products from your location and deliver them directly to customers.
With transparent and affordable delivery charges, sellers can focus on growing their online business without worrying about logistics operations.

howItWorks.title: How to Ship Your Orders in 3 Simple Steps

steps.title: Manage and process your orders
steps.desc: Log in to the ArcNxt Seller Panel, accept orders, and download the shipping label and manifest.

steps.title: Pack your product for pickup
steps.desc: Pack the product securely using plain, unbranded packaging and attach the shipping label clearly.

steps.title: Hand over to delivery partner
steps.desc: Our logistics partner will pick up the shipment from your address and deliver it to the customer.

howItWorks.note: Sit back and relax while ArcNxt ensures safe and timely delivery. Well-packed and on-time shipments lead to happier customers and repeat orders.

timeline.title: Shipping Timeline
timeline.desc: Orders must be dispatched within 2‚Äì3 days from order confirmation, as per the committed Service Level Agreement (SLA). Sellers can track dispatch deadlines and order status in the Seller Panel.

returns.title: Return Policy
paragraphs: Customers can request a return within 7 days of delivery. Undelivered shipments are marked as Return to Origin (RTO).
The Seller Panel provides complete visibility into returns and RTOs, including tracking, compensation, and charge details.
points: Return shipping fees may apply for customer-initiated returns based on shipment weight.
No additional shipping fee is charged for RTO shipments.
All return and RTO charges can be tracked and managed from the Seller Panel.
In exceptional cases, return shipping fees may be waived.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.subtitle: No Cancellation Penalty
cancellation.desc: Sellers are not charged any penalty for genuine order cancellations due to inventory or operational constraints. ArcNxt allows sellers to continue business without unnecessary financial stress.
